verses.kjv: Also, thou son of man, prophesy unto the mountains of Israel, and say, Ye mountains of Israel, hear the word of the LORD:
verses.web: You, son of man, prophesy to the mountains of Israel, and say, “You mountains of Israel, hear LORD’s word.
verses.ct: "Son of man, prophesy to the mountains of Israel. Say to them: Mountains of Israel, listen to the word of the LORD!

verses.kjv: Thus saith the Lord GOD; Because the enemy hath said against you, Aha, even the ancient high places are ours in possession:
verses.web: The Lord LORD says: ‘Because the enemy has said against you, “Aha!” and, “The ancient high places are ours in possession!” ’
verses.ct: This is what the Lord GOD says: Your enemies have gloated over you, saying, 'The ancient hilltops are ours now!'

verses.kjv: Therefore prophesy and say, Thus saith the Lord GOD; Because they have made you desolate, and swallowed you up on every side, that ye might be a possession unto the residue of the heathen, and ye are taken up in the lips of talkers, and are an infamy of the people:
verses.web: therefore prophesy, and say, ‘The Lord LORD says: “Because, even because they have made you desolate, and swallowed you up on every side, that you might be a possession to the residue of the nations, and you are taken up in the lips of talkers, and the evil report of the people;”
verses.ct: So prophesy and say: This is what the Lord GOD says: They devastated you and swallowed you up from every direction so that the surrounding nations could claim you as their own. You became the subject of gossip and slander among the peoples.

verses.kjv: Therefore, ye mountains of Israel, hear the word of the Lord GOD; Thus saith the Lord GOD to the mountains, and to the hills, to the rivers, and to the valleys, to the desolate wastes, and to the cities that are forsaken, which became a prey and derision to the residue of the heathen that are round about;
verses.web: therefore, you mountains of Israel, hear the word of the Lord LORD: The Lord LORD says to the mountains and to the hills, to the watercourses and to the valleys, to the desolate wastes and to the cities that are forsaken, which have become a prey and derision to the residue of the nations that are all around;
verses.ct: So listen, mountains of Israel, to the word of the Lord GOD. The Lord GOD says this to the mountains and hills, to the ravines and valleys, to the desolate ruins and abandoned cities that have become plunder and a joke to the surrounding nations:

verses.kjv: Therefore thus saith the Lord GOD; Surely in the fire of my jealousy have I spoken against the residue of the heathen, and against all Idumea, which have appointed my land into their possession with the joy of all their heart, with despiteful minds, to cast it out for a prey.
verses.web: therefore the Lord LORD says: “Surely in the fire of my jealousy I have spoken against the residue of the nations, and against all Edom, that have appointed my land to themselves for a possession with the joy of all their heart, with despite of soul, to cast it out for a prey.” ’
verses.ct: The Lord GOD declares: In the fire of my jealousy I have spoken against the rest of the nations and against all of Edom, who seized my land for themselves with gleeful hearts and hateful contempt, treating it as something to loot and exploit.

verses.kjv: Prophesy therefore concerning the land of Israel, and say unto the mountains, and to the hills, to the rivers, and to the valleys, Thus saith the Lord GOD; Behold, I have spoken in my jealousy and in my fury, because ye have borne the shame of the heathen:
verses.web: Therefore prophesy concerning the land of Israel, and tell the mountains, the hills, the watercourses and the valleys, ‘The Lord LORD says: “Behold, I have spoken in my jealousy and in my wrath, because you have borne the shame of the nations.”
verses.ct: So prophesy about the land of Israel. Tell the mountains and hills, the ravines and valleys: This is what the Lord GOD says: I have spoken in my jealousy and fury because you have endured the mockery of the nations.

verses.kjv: Therefore thus saith the Lord GOD; I have lifted up mine hand, Surely the heathen that are about you, they shall bear their shame.
verses.web: Therefore the Lord LORD says: “I have sworn, ‘Surely the nations that are around you will bear their shame.’
verses.ct: Therefore the Lord GOD says: I have sworn an oath — the nations surrounding you will be the ones who bear their own shame.

verses.kjv: But ye, O mountains of Israel, ye shall shoot forth your branches, and yield your fruit to my people of Israel; for they are at hand to come.
verses.web: “ ‘ “But you, mountains of Israel, you shall shoot out your branches, and yield your fruit to my people Israel; for they are at hand to come.
verses.ct: But you, mountains of Israel, will grow new branches and produce fruit for my people Israel, because they are coming home soon.

verses.kjv: For, behold, I am for you, and I will turn unto you, and ye shall be tilled and sown:
verses.web: For, behold, I am for you, and I will come to you, and you will be tilled and sown.
verses.ct: I am on your side. I will turn my attention to you, and you will be plowed and planted again.

verses.kjv: And I will multiply men upon you, all the house of Israel, even all of it: and the cities shall be inhabited, and the wastes shall be builded:
verses.web: I will multiply men on you, all the house of Israel, even all of it. The cities will be inhabited, and the waste places will be built.
verses.ct: I will fill you with people — all of the house of Israel, every last one. The cities will be lived in again, and the ruins will be rebuilt.

verses.kjv: And I will multiply upon you man and beast; and they shall increase and bring fruit: and I will settle you after your old estates, and will do better unto you than at your beginnings: and ye shall know that I am the LORD.
verses.web: I will multiply man and animal on you. They will increase and be fruitful. I will cause you to be inhabited as you were before, and you will do better than at your beginnings. Then you will know that I am LORD.
verses.ct: I will multiply both people and livestock on you. They will grow and be fruitful. I will resettle you as you were before, and I will make things even better for you than they were in the beginning. Then you will know that I am the LORD.

verses.kjv: Yea, I will cause men to walk upon you, even my people Israel; and they shall possess thee, and thou shalt be their inheritance, and thou shalt no more henceforth bereave them of men.
verses.web: Yes, I will cause men to walk on you, even my people Israel. They will possess you, and you will be their inheritance, and you will never again bereave them of their children.”
verses.ct: I will bring people — my people Israel — to walk on you again. They will possess you, and you will be their homeland. Never again will you rob them of their children."

verses.kjv: Thus saith the Lord GOD; Because they say unto you, Thou land devourest up men, and hast bereaved thy nations;
verses.web: “ ‘The Lord LORD says: “Because they say to you, ‘You are a devourer of men, and have been a bereaver of your nation;’
verses.ct: "This is what the Lord GOD says: People say about you, 'That land devours its people and robs its nation of its children.'

verses.kjv: Therefore thou shalt devour men no more, neither bereave thy nations any more, saith the Lord GOD.
verses.web: therefore you shall devour men no more, and not bereave your nation any more,” says the Lord LORD.
verses.ct: But you will no longer devour people or rob your nation of its children," declares the Lord GOD.

verses.kjv: Neither will I cause men to hear in thee the shame of the heathen any more, neither shalt thou bear the reproach of the people any more, neither shalt thou cause thy nations to fall any more, saith the Lord GOD.
verses.web: “I won’t let you hear the shame of the nations any more. You won’t bear the reproach of the peoples any more, and you won’t cause your nation to stumble any more,” says the Lord LORD.’ ”
verses.ct: "I will make sure you never again hear the taunts of the nations. You will no longer suffer the insults of other peoples, and you will never again cause your nation to stumble," declares the Lord GOD."

verses.kjv: Moreover the word of the LORD came unto me, saying,
verses.web: Moreover LORD’s word came to me, saying,
verses.ct: The word of the LORD came to me again:

verses.kjv: Son of man, when the house of Israel dwelt in their own land, they defiled it by their own way and by their doings: their way was before me as the uncleanness of a removed woman.
verses.web: “Son of man, when the house of Israel lived in their own land, they defiled it by their ways and by their deeds. Their way before me was as the uncleanness of a woman in her impurity.
verses.ct: "Son of man, when the house of Israel lived in their own land, they made it unclean by the way they lived and the things they did. Their behavior was as repulsive to me as a woman's menstrual impurity.

verses.kjv: Wherefore I poured my fury upon them for the blood that they had shed upon the land, and for their idols wherewith they had polluted it:
verses.web: Therefore I poured out my wrath on them for the blood which they had poured out on the land, and because they had defiled it with their idols.
verses.ct: So I poured out my fury on them — because of the blood they had spilled on the land and because they had polluted it with their idols.

verses.kjv: And I scattered them among the heathen, and they were dispersed through the countries: according to their way and according to their doings I judged them.
verses.web: I scattered them among the nations, and they were dispersed through the countries. I judged them according to their way and according to their deeds.
verses.ct: I scattered them among the nations and dispersed them across foreign lands. I judged them according to how they had lived and what they had done.

verses.kjv: And when they entered unto the heathen, whither they went, they profaned my holy name, when they said to them, These are the people of the LORD, and are gone forth out of his land.
verses.web: When they came to the nations where they went, they profaned my holy name; in that men said of them, ‘These are LORD’s people, and have left his land.’
verses.ct: But wherever they went among the nations, they brought disgrace to my holy name. People would say, 'These are the LORD's people, and yet they had to leave his land.'

verses.kjv: But I had pity for mine holy name, which the house of Israel had profaned among the heathen, whither they went.
verses.web: But I had respect for my holy name, which the house of Israel had profaned among the nations where they went.
verses.ct: I was deeply concerned for my holy name, which the house of Israel had disgraced among the nations wherever they went.

verses.kjv: Therefore say unto the house of Israel, Thus saith the Lord GOD; I do not this for your sakes, O house of Israel, but for mine holy name’s sake, which ye have profaned among the heathen, whither ye went.
verses.web: “Therefore tell the house of Israel, ‘The Lord LORD says: “I don’t do this for your sake, house of Israel, but for my holy name, which you have profaned among the nations where you went.
verses.ct: So tell the house of Israel: This is what the Lord GOD says: I'm not doing this for your sake, house of Israel, but for the sake of my holy name, which you have disgraced among the nations wherever you went.

verses.kjv: And I will sanctify my great name, which was profaned among the heathen, which ye have profaned in the midst of them; and the heathen shall know that I am the LORD, saith the Lord GOD, when I shall be sanctified in you before their eyes.
verses.web: I will sanctify my great name, which has been profaned among the nations, which you have profaned among them. Then the nations will know that I am LORD,” says the Lord LORD, “when I am proven holy in you before their eyes.
verses.ct: I will restore the honor of my great name that has been disgraced among the nations — the name you dragged through the dirt among them. Then the nations will know that I am the LORD," declares the Lord GOD, "when I demonstrate my holiness through you right before their eyes.

verses.kjv: For I will take you from among the heathen, and gather you out of all countries, and will bring you into your own land.
verses.web: “ ‘ “For I will take you from among the nations and gather you out of all the countries, and will bring you into your own land.
verses.ct: I will take you out of the nations, gather you from every country, and bring you back to your own land.

verses.kjv: Then will I sprinkle clean water upon you, and ye shall be clean: from all your filthiness, and from all your idols, will I cleanse you.
verses.web: I will sprinkle clean water on you, and you will be clean. I will cleanse you from all your filthiness, and from all your idols.
verses.ct: I will sprinkle clean water on you, and you will be clean. I will wash away all your filth and purify you from all your idols.

verses.kjv: A new heart also will I give you, and a new spirit will I put within you: and I will take away the stony heart out of your flesh, and I will give you an heart of flesh.
verses.web: I will also give you a new heart, and I will put a new spirit within you. I will take away the stony heart out of your flesh, and I will give you a heart of flesh.
verses.ct: I will give you a new heart and put a new spirit inside you. I will remove the heart of stone from your body and give you a heart of flesh.

verses.kjv: And I will put my spirit within you, and cause you to walk in my statutes, and ye shall keep my judgments, and do them.
verses.web: I will put my Spirit within you, and cause you to walk in my statutes. You will keep my ordinances and do them.
verses.ct: I will put my Spirit inside you and move you to follow my laws. You will carefully obey my commands.

verses.kjv: And ye shall dwell in the land that I gave to your fathers; and ye shall be my people, and I will be your God.
verses.web: You will dwell in the land that I gave to your fathers. You will be my people, and I will be your God.
verses.ct: You will live in the land I gave to your ancestors. You will be my people, and I will be your God.

verses.kjv: I will also save you from all your uncleannesses: and I will call for the corn, and will increase it, and lay no famine upon you.
verses.web: I will save you from all your uncleanness. I will call for the grain, and will multiply it, and lay no famine on you.
verses.ct: I will save you from everything that made you unclean. I will command the grain to grow abundantly and never again send famine against you.

verses.kjv: And I will multiply the fruit of the tree, and the increase of the field, that ye shall receive no more reproach of famine among the heathen.
verses.web: I will multiply the fruit of the tree and the increase of the field, that you may receive no more the reproach of famine among the nations.
verses.ct: I will make the trees bear more fruit and the fields produce bigger harvests, so you will never again be humiliated by famine among the nations.

verses.kjv: Then shall ye remember your own evil ways, and your doings that were not good, and shall lothe yourselves in your own sight for your iniquities and for your abominations.
verses.web: “ ‘ “Then you will remember your evil ways, and your deeds that were not good; and you will loathe yourselves in your own sight for your iniquities and for your abominations.
verses.ct: Then you will remember your evil ways and the terrible things you did, and you will be disgusted with yourselves because of your sins and your detestable practices.

verses.kjv: Not for your sakes do I this, saith the Lord GOD, be it known unto you: be ashamed and confounded for your own ways, O house of Israel.
verses.web: I don’t do this for your sake,” says the Lord LORD. “Let it be known to you: be ashamed and confounded for your ways, house of Israel.”
verses.ct: I want you to understand — I'm not doing this for your sake," declares the Lord GOD. "Be ashamed and humiliated by the way you have lived, house of Israel."

verses.kjv: Thus saith the Lord GOD; In the day that I shall have cleansed you from all your iniquities I will also cause you to dwell in the cities, and the wastes shall be builded.
verses.web: “ ‘The Lord LORD says: “In the day that I cleanse you from all your iniquities, I will cause the cities to be inhabited and the waste places will be built.
verses.ct: This is what the Lord GOD says: On the day I cleanse you from all your sins, I will resettle your cities and rebuild the ruins.

verses.kjv: And the desolate land shall be tilled, whereas it lay desolate in the sight of all that passed by.
verses.web: The land that was desolate will be tilled instead of being a desolation in the sight of all who passed by.
verses.ct: The land that lay desolate will be farmed again, instead of sitting empty for every passerby to see.

verses.kjv: And they shall say, This land that was desolate is become like the garden of Eden; and the waste and desolate and ruined cities are become fenced, and are inhabited.
verses.web: They will say, ‘This land that was desolate has become like the garden of Eden. The waste, desolate, and ruined cities are fortified and inhabited.’
verses.ct: People will say, 'This land that was a wasteland has become like the garden of Eden! The cities that were ruined, desolate, and destroyed are now fortified and full of people.'

verses.kjv: Then the heathen that are left round about you shall know that I the LORD build the ruined places, and plant that that was desolate: I the LORD have spoken it, and I will do it.
verses.web: Then the nations that are left around you will know that I, LORD, have built the ruined places, and planted that which was desolate. I, LORD, have spoken it, and I will do it.”
verses.ct: Then the nations still around you will know that I, the LORD, have rebuilt what was ruined and replanted what was desolate. I, the LORD, have spoken, and I will do it."

verses.kjv: Thus saith the Lord GOD; I will yet for this be enquired of by the house of Israel, to do it for them; I will increase them with men like a flock.
verses.web: “ ‘The Lord LORD says: “For this, moreover, I will be inquired of by the house of Israel, to do it for them: I will increase them with men like a flock.
verses.ct: This is what the Lord GOD says: "I will also let the house of Israel ask me to do this for them: I will multiply their people like a flock.

verses.kjv: As the holy flock, as the flock of Jerusalem in her solemn feasts; so shall the waste cities be filled with flocks of men: and they shall know that I am the LORD.
verses.web: As the flock for sacrifice, as the flock of Jerusalem in her appointed feasts, so the waste cities will be filled with flocks of men. Then they will know that I am LORD.’ ”
verses.ct: Like the flocks of sheep brought for sacrifice in Jerusalem during her appointed festivals — that's how the ruined cities will be filled with flocks of people. Then they will know that I am the LORD."
